name: THE LIFEPLAY (FrancescoPaci)
description:
Our adventure begins.

The Lifeplay is not only a game, but a new social experience: an open world title created for a community of players who can design environments, quests and contents together with the game developer; a group of friends working to realize the dream of a new, free world.

But this dream can turn into a nightmare and the game developer  will need everyone’s help to beat an old enemy which threatens to destroy this project and the hope of a better future.

How to (life)play?

You're maybe wondering how this game works.

The Lifeplay is always under development: each new version is made thanks to the choices of all players, their experiences, their feedback and their contributions. The project team will grow over time, creating an increasingly large and engaging game.

Follow the Lifeplay social media channels, stay tuned and always remember to download the latest version of the game!
